alert.note: Alert for Catahoula; Concordia (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued September 07 at 3:39PM CDT until September 07 at 4:30PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: The National Weather Service in Jackson has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Concordia Parish in northeastern Louisiana... Northwestern Catahoula Parish in northeastern Louisiana... * Until 430 PM CDT. * At 339 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Sherwood, or 7 miles northwest of Harrisonburg, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Harrisonburg and Aimwell around 345 PM CDT. Manifest around 355 PM CDT. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
